name: places/ChIJRbG_bQf0wokRmq7TU2q6gGk
formattedAddress: 100 Thayer St, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 100 Thayer St, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: By far the worst experience I have ever encountered as far as delivering food.  I ordered later in the day and it took nearly an hour to be delivered.. the delivery guy was extremely aggressive and rude and refused to deliver my food after waiting drastically over the time it was expected to be delivered!  He texted me, I responded about 2 mins after since I didn’t hear my phone go off and I called him and he got very rude and aggressive to the point I didn’t even feel comfortable having an encounter with him.  I just recovered having arm surgery and was trying to explain that to him- that it would take a minute to gather my shoes and keys when he hung up on me!!!! I HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND ORDERING HERE ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE ELDERLY OR DISABLED!!! I am thoroughly disgusted in my experience last night and the way the driver behaved. His aggressive and nasty behavior is unacceptable. You are literally getting paid to deliver food, I am giving you a tip to deliver my food and you are asking people to pay 2.99 for a delivery fee!!!! For what? To have a hostile man call you nearly 40 minutes after food was promised to be delivered to have him refuse to get into an elevator and deliver food and act like you’re the problem?!? ORDER SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!

originalText.text: The chef of this store is highly irresponsible he does not take orders right. For the first 2 times i went into the store i loved it. When it comes to the chef preparing my Food i strongly advice everyone to just go to the Latin american deli store across the street around the corner & on top off that the chef is really ignorant . . . .

originalText.text: Its a nice clean store. The deli man makes good sandwiches. Their deli is amazing. The food is amazing too. Everything is good in there!

text.text: Its a nice clean store. The deli man makes good sandwiches. Their deli is amazing. The food is amazing too. Everything is good in there!

originalText.text: No complaints really. Nice guy at counter. Just wish they used real butter for their rolls instead of tub-style margarine it seems. Won't get that again.

text.text: No complaints really. Nice guy at counter. Just wish they used real butter for their rolls instead of tub-style margarine it seems. Won't get that again.

originalText.text: Good food and nice guys here!   Get  a chicken and rice plate or a falafel sandwich some drinks and head to the park across the street for a quick delicious meal.
